About me

A full stack web designer, programmer and Pen tester / security auditor in Ethiopia. Working on security and exploitation. Learning and writing about web application. Giving in on fancy design, I am building problem solver application and participating on problem solving challenges such as Icoglab, google challenge and project Euler.
